description: Abul hasan are used to working in a fully staffed kitchen, when you work as a personal chef, you become a one-man show. It can be challenging to shift from a team driven focus to solely accountable, but some enjoy the challenge. Below are some of the average and expected responsibilities as a personal chef, but these may differ based on your employer

recipes.name: chicken Rost

ingradiants.poteto: 2 Yukon gold potatoes, peeled and chopped
ingradiants.mix: 1  fl oz (30 mL) dry onion soup seasoning mix

recipes.making_details: Place the chuck roast on a flat surface and season the top liberally with an even mixture of salt, pepper, and paprika. Flip the chuck roast over and season the bottom side as well, leaving the sides bare Heat oil in a and fry  onions till brown. add prawns,green chili,salt,and turmeric and cooks for 5-7 minites

recipes.name: Dry-hat Rost

ingradiants.mix: 1  fl oz (30 mL) dry onion soup seasoning mix

recipes.making_details: Place the chuck roast on a flat surface and season the top liberally with an even mixture of salt, pepper, and paprika. Flip the chuck roast over and season the bottom side as well, leaving the sides bare Heat oil in a and fry  onions till brown. add prawns,green chili,salt,and turmeric and cooks for 5-7 minites
